title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.9 - Towing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.9 - Towing

State Regulations
(a) No vehicle may
be towed by rope or other nonrigid device unless under the direction of an
agent or employee of the authority. (b) No vehicle may be towed on any part of
the authority facilities unless towed by a properly equipped and operated tow
truck, or other emergency service vehicle, unless under the supervision and
direction of an agent or employee of the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
204.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
